price: Mu by’ukuri twohereje Musa (azanye) ibitangaza byacu n’ibimenyetso bigaragara,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
